mapper.select: select ( case job when 1 then '班主任' when 2 then '讲师' when 3 then '学工主管' when 4 then '教研主管' when 5 then '咨询师' else '其它' end ) as pos ,count(*) as num from emp group by job order by num;
select count(gender) as value, (case gender when 1 then '男性员工' when 2 then '女性员工' else '外星人' end ) as name from emp group by gender

select (case degree when 1 then '初中' when 2 then '高中' when 3 then '大专' when 4 then '本科' when 5 then '硕士' when 6 then '博士' end ) as name, count(degree) as value from student group by degree order by value
select c.name as name, count(clazz_id) as value from student left join clazz c on c.id = student.clazz_id group by clazz_id order by value
